page.title: 09LEISURE TIME_CLEE HILL AREA
page.content: {Gardening}is a popular activity. Most houses have large enough gardens to grow flowers and vegetables. {Sport}is another enjoyable activity. Some people are involved with{ {Pigeon Racing.}The club meets twice a week. A race is held every Saturday except during the winter. It usually takes 2_3 hours if held in this country. Children in their leisure time, {play on the common, cycle, walk}and go {horse riding.}They collect{stamps, {marbles, sugars, badges, postcards, {soaps}and{model cars.}They go to{Judo, {Gymnastics}and{Swimming Clubs,}but these are all out of our area. At Knowbury, there is a{Brownie {Pack,}but{The Guide Company}is in Cleobury Mortimer.
